channel.title: Shops Help
channel.description:
Hey i was wondering how do i make a shop?and how can i put some rares and customs in it like d claws zaros gs and p hats i have them all already in the game i just want to know how can i add them all into one shop?can someone please help with like a code or somthing?i no its in shop.cfg but how do i make it?
Im using a blank source i have the basic shops but how do i make new ones and im using dragon history source.

item.title: Shops Help
item.dc:creator: @DdsScape_Cloud DdsScape Cloud
item.description:
@DdsScape_Cloud wrote:

Thank you so much!=p

Read full topic

item.title: Shops Help
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

lol, there was a tutorial on this flying around here somewhere.

Well… couldn’t find tutorial, but i do know how to. (lol, didn’t want to explain :p)

In the shop configs, the shop number is the first one number you see in the row (up and down), then to the left is the shop name, then is the item id (the item being sold in the fist slot) then the amount you are able to buy at once. then it continues like that. (item id, amount; item id, amount) got that? Now to put your custom item in to the shop you need to put that item id in the item id part, then add how many you want in that shop. If you want to make a new one, well… i can’t exactly remember lol, sorry :p… hope that helped.

Read full topic
